text: وقل رب اعوذ بك من همزت الشيطين

translations.translation: Say: 'My Lord, I seek refuge with You from the goadings of the shaytans,
Say: "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the evil promptings of the devils.
And pray: "My Lord! I seek Your refuge from the suggestions of the evil ones;
Say, "Lord, I seek your protection against the strong temptations of the devils.
And submit, “My Lord! I seek Your refuge from the instigation of the devils.”
And say: "My Lord! I seek refuge with You from the whisperings of the Shayatin."
And say: O my Lord! I seek refuge in Thee from the evil suggestions of the Shaitans;
And say: 'O my Lord, I take refuge in Thee from the evil suggestions of the Satans,
And say: My Lord! I seek refuge in Thee from suggestions of the evil ones,
and say, "My Lord, I seek refuge with You from the prompting of the devils.
And say thou: my Lord! I seek refuge with Thee against the whisperings of the satans;
Say, ‘My Lord! I seek Your protection from the promptings of devils,
And say "O my Lord! I seek refuge with Thee from the suggestions of the Evil Ones.
And say: "My Lord! I seek refuge with You from the whisperings (suggestions) of the Shayatin (devils).
And say: 'O my Lord, I seek refuge in You from evil suggestions of the satans.
And say, “My Lord, I seek refuge with You from the urgings of the devils.
And say, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils,
[23:97] And say: ‘My Lord, I seek protection in You from the promptings of devils, [from] their [evil] suggestions, which they whisper.
(And say: My Lord! I seek refuge in Thee from suggestions) from the insinuations (of the evil ones) that bewitch humans,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَقُلْ رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَاتِ ٱلشَّياطِينِ } معناه من غَمَزاتِهم

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَقُلْ رَّبِّ } يا من رباني بكنفك وجوارك { أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَاتِ ٱلشَّياطِينِ } [المؤمنون: 97] ووساوسه وأنواع تسويلاته وتلبيساته { وَ } لا سيما { أَعُوذُ } وألوذ { بِكَ } يا { رَبِّ أَن يَحْضُرُونِ } [المؤمنون: 98] عند توجهي نحوك،وتحنني إليك ومناجاتي معك، سيما في خلال صلاتي وعند تلاوتي وعرض حاجاتي

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { وقل ربِّ أعوذُ بك من هَمَزاتِ الشياطين } أي: وساوسهم المغرية على خلاف ما أمرت من المحاسن، التي من جملتها دفع السيئة بالحسنة، وأصل الهمز: النخس، ومنه: مهماز الرائض، شبه حثهم للناس على المعاصي بهمز الرائض الدوابَّ على الإسراع والوثب
